Suddenly being a Spartan!?"},{"lineNumber":220255,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":220256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まあまあ、頑張りましょうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well, well, let’s do our best.\""},{"lineNumber":220257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうしちゃう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Should we do that?\""},{"lineNumber":220258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんた達……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys...\""},{"lineNumber":220259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じょ、冗談っすよ！　冗談！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"J-j-just kidding! Just kidding!"},{"lineNumber":220260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":220261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「既に中に兵達が行ったと聞いたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I heard soldiers have already gone inside,"},{"lineNumber":220262,"originalJapaneseLine":"　状況は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What is the situation?\""},{"lineNumber":220263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes sir!\""},{"lineNumber":220264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「五十名からなる隊を組織し、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We organized a unit of fifty men,"},{"lineNumber":220265,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早雲殿を捕らえようとしましたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"and attempted to capture Lord Soun,"},{"lineNumber":220266,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪の襲撃に遭い多大な被害を受け失敗……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but were attacked by youkai, suffered heavy casualties, and failed...\""},{"lineNumber":220267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その後、人数を二百名にしましたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After that, we increased the number to two hundred,"},{"lineNumber":220268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　途中で鬼との戦闘になり、","translatedEnglishLine":"but during the midst, we fought oni,"},{"lineNumber":220269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ以上は進めぬと断念いたしました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and we gave up, unable to advance any further...\""},{"lineNumber":220270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eeh!?"},{"lineNumber":220271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　に、二百人で行って駄目だったのかよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-you went with two hundred and it still didn't work!?"},{"lineNumber":220272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmmmmm..."},{"lineNumber":220273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　む、無理だってぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"N-not possible..."},{"lineNumber":220274,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジ無理だってぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Seriously, it’s impossible...\""},{"lineNumber":220275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な、な、＜エール＞。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-n-n, <Yell>."},{"lineNumber":220276,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今ならまだ間に合う。","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s still time now."},{"lineNumber":220277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中に入るの考え直そうぜぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s reconsider going inside...\""},{"lineNumber":220278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":220279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんなの、その自信……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What’s with that confidence..."},{"lineNumber":220280,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どっから出てんのぉ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where does it come from...?\""},{"lineNumber":220281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh..."},{"lineNumber":220282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そりゃ、そうなんだけどよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, yeah, that’s true, but..."},{"lineNumber":220283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジで？　超助かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously? That helps a lot."},{"lineNumber":220284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対離すなよ、絶対だかんな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t ever let go, absolutely, okay?\""},{"lineNumber":220285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆の者、ご苦労だった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, thank you for your hard work.\""},{"lineNumber":220286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここより先は私達だけで行く。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From here onwards, we will go alone."},{"lineNumber":220287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君達はここに残り門を誰も通さぬように」","translatedEnglishLine":"You all will stay here and make sure no one passes through the gate.\""},{"lineNumber":220288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no way!\""},{"lineNumber":220289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なりません！　乱義様達だけで行かせるなど！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That can't happen! We won’t let Lord Rangi and the others go alone!\""},{"lineNumber":220290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鬼、妖怪など、この地に現れている者は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The oni, youkai, and others appearing in this land"},{"lineNumber":220291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　訓練された兵士でも手に余る者ばかり」","translatedEnglishLine":"are all more than even trained soldiers can handle.\""},{"lineNumber":220292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達、魔王の子だけで入るのが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For us, the Demon King's children, to enter alone,"},{"lineNumber":220293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっとも被害の少ない方法なのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the method with the least amount of casualties.\""},{"lineNumber":220294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、くう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, kuu...\""},{"lineNumber":220295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……分かりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Understood.\""},{"lineNumber":220296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、聞き入れてくれて」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for accepting that.\""},{"lineNumber":220297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、俺らだけで行くの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, we’re going alone!?\""},{"lineNumber":220298,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、マジかよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, seriously...?\""},{"lineNumber":220299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「長田君、大丈夫？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nagata-kun, are you alright?"},{"lineNumber":220300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お姉ちゃんと手を繋いで行く？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Want to hold hands with your big sister and go?\""},{"lineNumber":220301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジすか？　超助かるっす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really? That’s a huge help.\""},{"lineNumber":220302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの、乱義様……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-um, Lord Rangi...!\""},{"lineNumber":220303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すずさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suzu-san."},{"lineNumber":220304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早雲様のことならご安心下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Please rest assured about Lord Soun."},{"lineNumber":220305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必ず、無事に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We will definitely... bring him back safely.\""},{"lineNumber":220306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえ、お願いが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, I have a request...\""},{"lineNumber":220307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか私も連れて行って下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please, take me with you as well!\""},{"lineNumber":220308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方も？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You too?\""},{"lineNumber":220309,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義は少し思案こそしたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi pondered for a moment,"},{"lineNumber":220310,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐに頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"then immediately nodded."},{"lineNumber":220311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かりました。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前って案外真面目だよなあ……」
「ま、まあまあ、頑張りましょうだ」
「既に中に兵達が行ったと聞いたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard soldiers have already gone inside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「五十名からなる隊を組織し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We organized a unit of fifty men,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲殿を捕らえようとしましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and attempted to capture Lord Soun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪の襲撃に遭い多大な被害を受け失敗……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but were attacked by youkai, suffered heavy casualties, and failed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後、人数を二百名にしましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, we increased the number to two hundred,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中で鬼との戦闘になり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but during the midst, we fought oni,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以上は進めぬと断念いたしました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we gave up, unable to advance any further..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: に、二百人で行って駄目だったのかよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you went with two hundred and it still didn't work!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中に入るの考え直そうぜぇ……」
そりゃ、そうなんだけどよぉ……」
絶対離すなよ、絶対だかんな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t ever let go, absolutely, okay?"
"Everyone, thank you for your hard work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここより先は私達だけで行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From here onwards, we will go alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達はここに残り門を誰も通さぬように」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all will stay here and make sure no one passes through the gate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なりません！　乱義様達だけで行かせるなど！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That can't happen! We won’t let Lord Rangi and the others go alone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鬼、妖怪など、この地に現れている者は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The oni, youkai, and others appearing in this land

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 訓練された兵士でも手に余る者ばかり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are all more than even trained soldiers can handle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達、魔王の子だけで入るのが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For us, the Demon King's children, to enter alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっとも被害の少ない方法なのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the method with the least amount of casualties."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとう、聞き入れてくれて」
お姉ちゃんと手を繋いで行く？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Want to hold hands with your big sister and go?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジすか？　超助かるっす」
早雲様のことならご安心下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please rest assured about Lord Soun.
We will definitely... bring him back safely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか私も連れて行って下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, take me with you as well!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義は少し思案こそしたが、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
